name: Hammer Time
tooltip: Spins around, gaining <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_HostBuff.modifiers[1].amount"/> armor and dealing <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_impactDamage.amount/duckiesClonePaladinSpin_HostBuff.periodic_duration" style="Red"/> damage per second to nearby enemies. Damaged enemies will have their attack speed briefly reduced by <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_ImpactSlowBuff.modifiers[0].amount*(-1)"/>%. Lasts <d ref="duckiesClonePaladinSpin_HostBuff.duration"/> seconds.
